Uses of Interface
pythagoras.d.IMatrix4

  • Packages that use IMatrix4 
    Package Description
    pythagoras.d
    The Pythagoras geometry utility classes specialized on double.

    • Uses of IMatrix4 in pythagoras.d

      Classes in pythagoras.d that implement IMatrix4 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Matrix4
      A 4x4 column-major matrix.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IMatrix4 Matrix4.IDENTITY
      The identity matrix.

      Linearly interpolates between this and the specified other matrix, treating the matrices as affine.

      Linearly interpolates between this and the specified other matrix (treating the matrices as affine), placing the result in this matrix.
      Matrix4 Matrix4.lerpLocal(IMatrix4 other, double t)
      Linearly interpolates between the this and the specified other matrix, placing the result in this matrix.
